text: The NFL Top 100 Players of 2012 was the second season of the series. It ended with reigning NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers being ranked #1, while Super Bowl MVP Eli Manning was ranked #31. ==Episode list== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Episode No. !! Air date !!
